greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Positions of white keys on piano keyboard, start with A0 = the 1st key.
formula: G.f. for a keyboard with infinite number of keys: x*(x^7 + 2*x^6 + x^5 + 2*x^4 + 2*x^3 + x^2 + 2*x + 1)/(x^8 - x^7 - x + 1). (End)
a(n) = A060107(n) + 1 for 1 <= n <= 36. - _Jianing Song_, Oct 14 2019
example: First, 3rd, 4th, 6th, etc. keys of piano keyboard are white.
results.author: _David W. Wilson_, Mar 02 2003
